title: What am I doing wrong with yi?
body:
So everyone's been telling me he's one of those "devourer" junglers, and that guinsoo really makes a good combo with that. However, I went 6/6, and I don't see any point in using him.

Here's what happened:

I got CC'ed a lot.
Everyone can pile on me and I die.
My W just makes me a sitting duck.
Did I mention he's super squishy?

I can't gank with him because everyone I face has escapes, so they just run away before I can Q them. Even when I do, they just focus me and I'm dead in literally 2-3 seconds. I don't feel any damage with him at all. In teamfights, he feels USELESS.

What the hell do I even do with this thing you call a "master"?
